name: Posey Pillow ~ Cream Color ~ Studio Size
description:
Current ship time – All Posey Products ship within 2 business days via Priority Mail USPS. (vouchers purchased on deal sites excluded)

       -  Posey Pillow Studio Size (Cream Color reg price $94.99)

	-  40” Diameter 12” Rise (when filled it is taller, Does NOT come with fill. You are purchasing an unfilled beanbag)


	-  Does NOT come with bean bag fill (Studio Size requires aprox  13 cubic feet of fill)  Fill can be purchased at many local retailers such as, Walmart, Meijer, Bed Bath and Beyond, K-Mart. 



	-  Made of vinyl, has both a Velcro and zipper closure to prevent beanbag fill from leaking

	-  Posey Pillow is a puck shaped beanbag photo prop which provides professional photographers with a save elevated, easy to clean newborn posing surface.

- Not so small print
	- The Posey Pillow is designed and made for the use of a photo prop. Please do NOT leave infant or child unattended at ANY TIME!  This product is not intended for use as a common chair, bed or any use outside of a photography prop. Be sure to keep an additional person near the Posey Pillow while infant is being photographed!

- Although this product is made from high quality vinyl it is NOT puncture proof. Please be sure to keep this product away from sharp objects. Sharp objects may damage the Posey Pillow and NOT be repaired.

****Posey Pillow products to NOT come with bean bag fill****

- U.S Shipping $15.00. Ships via Priority Mail 2-3 day
- Canada Shipping $33.00. Ships Via Priority Mail International 7-10 day estimate
 - All Other Shipping $48.00. Ships via Priority Mail International. 7-10 day estimate

name: Squishy Poser by Posey Pillow
description:
**** Current ship time: 1-3 business days

Regular price $49.00

Squishy Poser is great for those newborn belly poses with babies butt up and head up higher

*Adjustable with 3 rows of snaps
*Each piece measures aprox 10 x 10
*Use together or separate as a wedge 
*Does NOT come with fill Bean Bag fill with some regular pillow     batting is recommended for this. If using all bean bag fill it will require aprox 1 cubic foot of fill.
* Heavy duty resin snaps 
* Vinyl may not match the vinyl of your Posey Pillow
* Zipper for fill point on bottom of ea squishy poser
* 2 pieces
* Cream Color
Ships within 2-3 business days via USPS Priority Mail. 
$6.00 US  
$20 Canada
$24 everywhere else

name: Posey Positioners ~ Lt Gray Color ~ Set of 5
description:
5 Posey Positioners  ~ Lt Gray Color  
  Regular Price $64.99

This Item ships free with the purchase of any size Posey Pillow

Fill is NOT included - Positioners ship empty!!!

NO MORE ROLLED BLANKETS NEEDED!!

Used for proping up babies in different positions on top of your Posey Pillow or other bean  bag

Made out of easy to clean Leather Like vinyl

locking zipper to hold the bean bag fill or rice in the positioners.

Easy to wipe clean but do not fully submerge the positioners in water.

Posey Positioners DO NOT COME FILLED!! Ships empty to save cost and higher shipping. 
Can be filled with rice or for a light weight prop, bean bag fill. 
Requires aprox 15lbs of rice to fill


3 Rectangles
1 16" X 5"
1 14" X 5"
1 13" X 8"

3 Squares
1 10" X 10"
1  8" X 8"



Ships within 2-3 business days via USPS Priority Mail. 
$6.00 US  
$20 Canada
$24 everywhere else

Measurements in second picture.

name: NEW  Posey Pillow ~ Tabletop Poser ~ Cream Color Or Lt Gray Color
description:
Posey Pillow square tabletop poser   Great for small spaces and single babies. Would be a very very tight fit for twins!! 

Regular Price $55.00

Tabletop poser has a handle, large zipper opening, easy(ish) to fill ( I just filled two in 25 min tops) 

Tabletop poser size ~ 27" square 12" high when filled. 

BEAN BAG FILL
Due to the size of this product it does NOT COME FILLED
you must purchase your fill to fill the Posey Pillow tabletop poser
Requires aprox 4 cubic feet or 125 liters of bean bag fill

US shipping - $12
Canada - $32
Everywhere else - $40
